Title: Tamil theatre: Welcome spoof
Content: Talk satire, think Cho, and that’s been it. After him Tamil theatre has rarely had a parody that packs a punch on present day politics and makes audiences laugh their lungs out. Maham Enterprises tri
Author: Malathi Rangarajan
